name: Tellers Report
query:
SELECT
`tabUser`.full_name as "Teller Name::200",
`tabTransactions Details`.currency as "Currency:150",
`tabTransactions Details`.posting_date as "Posting Date::120", 
SUM(inflow - outflow) as "TOTAL:Currency:150"
FROM
`tabTransactions Details`, `tabAgents`, `tabUser`
WHERE
`tabTransactions Details`.user_id = `tabAgents`.name
AND
`tabAgents`.agent_user = `tabUser`.email
GROUP BY
`tabTransactions Details`.user_id DESC
